name: Chaos Arena (iXALE)
description:
This is a small arcade like small survival game. Enemies can charge at you or fire plasma. Killing the enemies have random chances of spawning 0-5 more enemies of random types. More you kill them, More they grow in numbers. You gain HP after killing certain amount of enemies. So How LOng YOU CAN SURVIVE !?

[NOTE: For now only Keyboard & Mouse are supported. I'll try to polish the UI add Touch Support after the Jam]

This game is developed by myself (iXALE Games)

Code, Art, Sfx : iXALE

Music:  Cyberpunk Moonlight Sonata v2 by Joth
